title: ReviewerAgentArgs
description: Input arguments for the reviewer agent visual critique

overlayPaths.description: Local paths to full-page overlay PNGs (e.g., 'tmp/layout-overlay-page-3.png')

tilePaths.description: Local paths to quadrant tile PNGs (e.g., 'tmp/page-3-row1_col1.png'). Optional.

layoutJsonPath.description: Local path to merged layout JSON file

originalPagePaths.description: Local paths to original page images (without overlay) for comparison. Optional.
